subject: Spacers
description_text: Is it possible to have a set of spacers for the elastomers?

conversations.body_text: Hi Francesco,  Are you using our Pro Plus pedals? If you’d like to upgrade, we have a compatible upgrade kit available for connection.      https://www.simsonn.com/products/plus-ultra-upgrade-kit

Just need them for spare
Inviato da iPhone

Il giorno 9 gen 2026, alle ore 02:30, service@simsonn.com ha scritto:

﻿
Hi Francesco,

Are you using our Pro Plus pedals? If you’d like to upgrade, we have a compatible upgrade kit available for connection. 

https://www.simsonn.com/products/plus-ultra-upgrade-kit
